artiste: Various Artists, Max Ernst, Joan Miró, Yves Tanguy
artisteBio: Various, French and American, born Germany. 1891–1976, Spanish, 1893–1983, American, born France. 1900–1955
title: L'Antitête
medium: Three volume illustrated book with 46 etchings (23 with aquatint, 23 with pochoir, eight with drypoint, and eight with watercolor and ink additions)
